JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Customer Service Advisor, Malaga, Spanien
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you like to help others and are you confident using phone/ computers as part of your daily work? Are you interested in working with customers from Scandinavia?

In the role as Advisor your focus will be on inbound/outbound calls within the campaign and achieve the goals set by the client

As an Advisor you may take calls for more than one product or service and this requires attention to detail & a high degree of flexibility.

General Tasks:

  • Service inbound/outbound calls and provide customer support
  • Very good level of Danish language and fluent in English
  • Ongoing focus on providing great customer experiences in every customer contact – including focus on constant improvement of our customer measurements – such as customer satisfaction
  • Technical interest both mechanics and digitally
  • Upselling as a part of every call – using questions to establish what interests the client and to help provide a customized solution
  • Incoming calls and emails – focusing on customer service
  • Have 1-2-1 meetings with Operations Manager
  • Follow processes and procedures laid out within the project
  • Attend the premises of work on time ready to begin work at the agreed time
  • Work together as a core unit and reach the goal set.

We Offer:

  • Spanish work contract – from day one
  • Competitive salary plus achievable bonus
  • A modern and open office
  • Work from Home as an option
  • Regular employee events and incentives
  • Opportunity to develop your career
  • Paid vacations (4 week + 4 days/ calendar year)
  • Working hours: 08:00 - 17:00 Mon-Fri
  • Relocation Package

START: ASAP

LOCATION: Malaga, Benalmádena / WFH 

EMPLOYMENT TYPE: Full-time

More information:

Nichola Macey, Talent Sourcing Strategist at Webhelp Malaga SLU, nichola.macey@webhelp.com 

How to apply?

See the vacancy and apply online here:

https://webhelpspain.teamtailor.com/jobs/1702674-danish-speaking-customer-service-advisor

 

How does Webhelp respond to the Covid-19 situation?

Due to the current situation, we are receiving more questions regarding vacancies and practical questions about e.g. job start. We understand why and therefore, you can read here how we are responding to the Covid-19 situation. 

If you need further information, you are always welcome to contact our HR team, who is more than happy to answer your questions. 

Webhelp is a multinational Business Process Outsourcing company with its head office in Paris, France, that is making business more human for the world’s most exciting brands.

By choosing Webhelp, you will be part of a community of over 100'000 game-changers from more than 190 locations, speaking more than 80 languages in 50+ countries. 

Join us at Webhelp you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects for some of the most progressive brands worldwide.

More information can be found at www.webhelp.com
